model_outputs.model_answer:

3. Vincent: 9 (age) + 11 (weight) = 18 (cumulative age) + 11 (weight) = 29
4. Gwen: 8 (age) + 15 (weight) = 18 (cumulative age) + 15 (weight) = 33

(D) 62
